content:
The Great Tastes of Pennsylvania Wine & Food Festival

June 24th & 25th, 2017

Uncork summer with the 27th Annual Great Tastes of Pennsylvania Wine & Food Festival. This two-day, outdoor festival features food and craft vendors, live musical entertainment, and samples from an estimated 30 Pennsylvania wineries.

Tickets

Each ticket includes admission, wine glass for tasting at the wineries, and live music.

  • No one is allowed admission to the festival without a wristband. All vendors will have wristbands.
  • Pre-banding will start at least an hour prior to the start of the festival or earlier to be determined by festival staff.
  • Outside food & beverages other than unopened bottled water are NOT permitted into the festival.
  • Pets are NOT permitted inside the festival grounds.
  • Wine may only be opened in designated areas.
  • No RV parking or tailgating allowed on Split Rock Resort grounds.

Interested in showcasing your crafts or food products at the festival? Download the Craft Vendor Application or the Food Vendor Application. The vendor application deadline is April 7, 2017.
